prompt: Design a clean login form interface with a soft pastel theme. The UI should feature a centered single-column layout with a light pink background (Colors.pink[50]). At the top, display a 'Login to Your Account' heading in a bold, 28px font with a deep pink color (Colors.pink[800]). Below, include a subtitle 'Enter your details below' in a 14px font with a muted pink (Colors.pink[300]). Add two input fields: an email TextField with a soft rounded border (BorderRadius.circular(6)), a light gray border (Colors.grey[200]), an email icon prefix (Icons.email), a 'Email' label, and a hint text 'Your email address'. The password TextField should have similar styling with a lock icon prefix (Icons.lock), a 'Password' label, a hint text 'Your password', and a visibility toggle. Both fields should use a pink focused border (Colors.pink[600]). Include a 'Forgot Password?' link aligned to the right in deep pink (Colors.pink[600]) with a 13px font. Add a full-width elevated button for login with a pink background (Colors.pink[600]), white text, and rounded corners (BorderRadius.circular(6)). At the bottom, include a row with 'Not registered?' text in muted pink followed by a 'Sign Up' link in deep pink. Use 20 pixels padding around the main content and 10 pixels spacing between elements. The form container should have a white background with a subtle shadow (BoxShadow: color Colors.grey[300], blurRadius 8). Ensure the layout is responsive with scrolling support.
